snippet: The search for 10-year-old Jessica Ridgeway has shifted to a hunt for her killer in Colorado. “Everybody’s very scared,” one parent said. “There’s a predator that lives by somewhere.”
abstract: Police in Westminster, Colo, announce that they have found body of 10-year-old Jessica Ridgeway, who had disappeared on way to school, and vow to track down her killer; news shakes up grieving local community, which now fears there is a predator in their midst.
lead_paragraph: The search for 10-year-old Jessica Ridgeway has shifted to a hunt for her killer in Colorado. “Everybody’s very scared,” one parent said. “There’s a predator that lives by somewhere.”

headline.seo: Jessica Ridgeway’s Killing Leaves Community Heartbroken and Edgy
headline.main: A Girl’s Neighbors Are Left to Grieve and Fear a Predator in Their Midst
headline.print_headline: A Girl’s Neighbors Are Left to Grieve and Fear a Predator in Their Midst
